name: Cowboy Caviar (another variation)
ingredients: 2 cans corn (drain) 2 small bunches of green onions, chopped
2 cans black-­‐eyed peas (drain and rinse) 2 tsp. cumin
4-­‐5 chopped tomatoes 1 envelope Good Season's Italian Dressing (prepare
1 bunch cilantro (chopped) as directed on package)
steps: Pour dressing on top and then add fresh avacado and then lightly mix again.
